name: End_stage_kidney_disease_Comparator_Evidence_from_MAGICapp_313880
title: MAGIC-derived ComparatorOnlyEvidence: End-stage kidney disease in Standard care Group in Adults with type 2 diabetes with moderate CV risk

targetReference.display: MAGICapp Conversion Report: SGLT2 inhibitors and GLP-1 RA for type 2 diabetes

note.text: Defined as a GFR below 45 or a GFR below 70 AND macroalbuminuria (ACR > 200 mg/g); derived from RECODe (https://sanjaybasu.shinyapps.io/recode/).
